thread.title: Carnival Cruises has the cheekiest ad you’ll ever see
thread.title_full: Carnival Cruises has the cheekiest ad you’ll ever see

author: news.com.au
title: Carnival Cruises has the cheekiest ad you’ll ever see
text:
THIS cheeky ad should probably carry a “not safe for work” warning.
Not only will it like make you blush, snort, or spit out your cornflakes, there’s also a real risk it’ll cause you to start planning your next holiday instead of doing any work.
The world’s biggest cruise company has cottoned onto the concept that “sex sells” - and the result is the hilarious video above.
• WEIRDEST COMPLAINTS FROM CRUISE PASSENGERS
• 27 WAYS TO MAKE YOUR NEXT CRUISE AWESOME
• WOMAN’S INSANE DIVE INTO CRUISE SHIP POOL
• WIN $20K WORTH OF TRAVEL
The quirky video was released last year by Carnival Corporation, the parent company of cruise lines including Carnival Cruises, P&O Australia, Princess Cruises and Cunard Line.
With Australia now in the midst of its biggest cruise season in history, and more Aussies than ever taking cruise holidays, we reckon it’s the ideal time for first-timers to jump on the bandwagon and lose their “cruise virginity”.
For more travel news and inspiration sign up to Escape’s newsletter .
A scene from Carnival Corporation’s “cruise virgin” video. Source: Supplied
